heading: WHAT YOU NEED: Hand-held weight. This exercise will strengthen your wrists. It also will help ensure good form and prevent injury when you do upper body strength exercises.

steps.1: Rest your forearm on the arm of a sturdy chair with your hand over the edge.
steps.2: Hold weight with palm facing upward.
steps.3: Slowly bend your wrist up and down.
steps.6: Repeat 10-15 times more with each hand.
